title: Boutique Bannisters Seaside Escape on NSW’s South Coast
description: Escape to picturesque Mollymook Beach on the NSW South Coast at Bannisters Pavilion. Home to pretty picnic spots, fine white sands and stunning views, Mollymook is the ideal escape from the big city. Included in your package is daily continental rooftop breakfast, a shared pizza at the nearby Bannisters by the Sea (with transfer included), one drink each on arrival, a barista-made coffee on your last morning, 25% off massages of 60 minutes or more and a leisurely 11am checkout.
offer_address: Level 1/87 Tallwood Avenue, Mollymook Beach, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: Coastal Bannisters NSW Escape with Poolside Cocktails & Daily Breakfast
description:
A well-deserved stay at the sublime Bannisters Pavilion is the best way to uncover the coastal charms and soft sands of Mollymook Beach. Tucked away on the south coast of New South Wales, this laidback escape is seconds away from an abundance of breathtaking waterside walks, top-rated surf beaches, wildlife encounters, mouthwatering dining experiences and barefoot luxuries.

Located less than three hours from Sydney, this tranquil, contemporary haven dials up the luxury in a uniquely understated way to create an inviting atmosphere. Located just 80 metres from the beach and sheltered by swaying palm trees and exotic plants, Bannisters Pavilion is home to a sun-kissed rooftop pool, world-class modern Australian fare served at The Rooftop Bar & Grill and exceptional service, along with immaculately styled rooms fitted with a bespoke blend of aesthetic coastal-inspired décor and contemporary furnishings. It's no wonder that this unique accommodation is ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.
offer_address: Level 1/87 Tallwood Avenue, Mollymook Beach, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: Bannisters NSW Coastal Escape with Daily Breakfast & Two-Course Rick Stein Gourmet Dinner
description:
A well-deserved stay at the sublime Bannisters Pavilion is the best way to uncover the coastal charms of Mollymook Beach, tucked away on the South Coast of New South Wales, where an abundance of breathtaking waterside walks, top-rated surf beaches, wildlife encounters and mouth-watering dining experiences beckon.

Located less than three hours from Sydney, this tranquil haven fringed by swaying palm trees dials up the luxury in a uniquely understated way to create a laidback atmosphere, making it the ideal location for your fix of coastal bliss. Located just 80 metres from the beach, the hotel is home to a sun-drenched rooftop pool, world-class fare served at the Rooftop Bar & Grill and exceptional service, along with immaculately styled rooms fitted out with coastal-inspired décor and contemporary furnishings.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Delight your palate by starting each day with a delicious à la carte breakfast at the Rooftop Bar & Grill
- Toast your stay with one glass of sparkling wine per person upon arrival
- Satisfy your inner gourmand with with a two-course, set-menu dinner for two at Rick Stein at Bannisters
- Take in the gorgeous surroundings with a two-course dinner for two at the Rooftop Bar & Grill
offer_address: Level 1/87 Tallwood Avenue, Mollymook Beach, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: NSW South Coast Escape Moments from Mollymook Beach with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Pool
description:
A relaxing stay at this sublime escape is the best way to uncover the coastal charms and soft sands of Mollymook Beach. Tucked away on the south coast of New South Wales, this laidback escape is moments away from an abundance of breathtaking waterside walks, top-rated surf beaches, wildlife encounters and mouthwatering dining experiences.

Located less than a three-hour drive from Sydney and Canberra, this tranquil, contemporary haven dials up luxury for an inviting atmosphere. Home to a sun-kissed rooftop pool, Bannisters Pavilion also offers world-class modern Australian fare served at The Rooftop Bar & Grill and immaculately styled rooms with a blend of coastal-inspired decor and contemporary furnishings.

Venture out to explore the township of Milton and visit the antique shops or indulge in the local culinary scene, offering the freshest seafood and locally sourced produce. To top it off, the hotel is only 80 metres from the beach, sheltered by swaying palm trees and exotic plants - coastal living at its finest.
offer_address: Level 1/87 Tallwood Avenue, Mollymook Beach, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: Boutique Gourmet Escape on NSW’s South Coast
description: Escape to picturesque Mollymook Beach on the NSW South Coast with an incredible gourmet stay at Bannisters by the Sea. Stay in ultimate coastal luxury with sweeping ocean views and enjoy nightly dinner for two with a bottle of wine - including one dinner at the acclaimed on-site Rick Stein seafood restaurant - daily breakfast, one romantic picnic lunch for two, a welcome cocktail and more.
